title: Buffalo - Volcanic Rock (1973)
description:
Volcanic Rock is the second album for Australian proto-heavy metal band Buffalo, recorded and originally released in 1973 on the Vertigo label. The album was stylistically a much harder, heavier and rawer release than its predecessor (Dead Forever...) Ã¢â‚¬â€œ marking a move away from the band's previous progressive rock influences, although retaining a psych element to their sound. Volcanic Rock had been recorded effectively as a live-in-the-studio effort, with only vocal and additional guitar overdubs added later during the recording sessions.


01. Sunrise (Come My Way)
02. Freedom
03. Till My Death
04. The Prophet
05. Intro: Pound of Flesh 
06. Shylock^
07. Sunrise (Come My Way) (single version)*
08. Shylock - (live recording - Sydney Spring Festival 1973, Hyde Park)
